name: strdel

params_body.name: string[]
params_body.description: The string to delete part of.

params_body.name: start
params_body.description: The position of the first character to delete.

params_body.name: end
params_body.description: The position of the last character to delete.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
pawn_code:
new string[42] = "We will delete everything apart from this";
strdel(string, 0, 37); // string is now "this"
related_fn:
strcmp: Compare two strings to check if they are the same.
 strfind: Search for a string in another string.
 strtok: Get the next 'token' (word/parameter) in a string.
 strins: Insert text into a string.
 strlen: Get the length of a string.
 strmid: Extract part of a string into another string.
 strpack: Pack a string into a destination string.
 strval: Convert a string into an integer.
 strcat: Concatenate two strings into a destination reference.
